25#ifndef PGPSUM_H_
26#define PGPSUM_H_ 20121003
27
28#include <sys/types.h>
29
30#include <inttypes.h>
31
32uint16_t pgp_ntoh16(uint16_t /*in*/);
33uint16_t pgp_hton16(uint16_t /*in*/);
34uint32_t pgp_ntoh32(uint32_t /*in*/);
35uint32_t pgp_hton32(uint32_t /*in*/);
36
37int pgpv_digest_file(uint8_t */*buf*/, size_t /*size*/, const char */*name*/, const uint8_t */*hashed*/, size_t /*hashsize*/, int /*doarmor*/);
38int pgpv_digest_memory(uint8_t */*buf*/, size_t /*size*/, void */*memory*/, size_t /*cc*/, const uint8_t */*hashed*/, size_t /*hashsize*/, int /*doarmor*/);
39
40#endif
